content: Total drivel; every word of it. What is on display here is petulance, self interested, juvenile petulance. Your candidate; the psychopathic sociopath, the racketeer, the influence peddler, the liar, the incompetent but entitled vagina, lost, get over it. I am not going to reply in detail to your idiocies, that would be a waste of time, but I am going to warn you, we have just had an election and the results are clear. If, however, your side nullifies that election by so called “resistance” which is nothing but collectivist terrorism, the next stage is not an assumption of power by your socialist BS artists, it is street battles followed by a military coup. The great Chilean hero General Pinochet showed the way and that is what you will get.
